title: Peeche pad gaye hain besharam.
comments: i am not kidding you, i got more or less the same message on telegram from "hr rukmini" just yesterday hahahahaha. i wish i had taken screenshots before reporting and deleting the chat!
there is no point in arguing with them. Just block or have some fun.
Just block looks like a scam to me

Take the bait, they will really pay you 250rs 

Keep continuing till they demand money or stop paying you 

Don’t let the greed overtook you and you scammed the scamster

Honestly they play a number game. Even if you scam them petty amount, they gonna jump to next target
i said it before and i will say it again....ask for nudes
Take help from Google translation and start talking in a different language.

Give 5 star send screenshot... 
After receiving money make that 1 star...
Businesses who do this type of scam should get 1 star...
Free 150
I got the same message too
